Text: RE TW ThroughputThanks Sorry for the continuous houndingIm trying to wrap up a presentation for Stan Gina Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Taylor Gina Moore Jan Subject RE TW Throughput Thats what I was asking Jan previously does the Bcfd include any estimates or is that an actual number Gina I am waiting for Steve to respond to two emails Ive sent him requesting comments on the slide He is in Dallas today Original Message From Taylor Gina Sent Tuesday February AM To Donoho Lindy Moore Jan Subject RE TW Throughput Thanks Should I call an estimate or is this actual Also any changes on the slide I sent yesterday Gina Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Taylor Gina Moore Jan Subject RE TW Throughput I have Bcfd for annual daily average for total system in on TW Original Message From Taylor Gina Sent Tuesday February AM To Donoho Lindy Moore Jan Subject RE TW Throughput Ill take an estimate for TW througput per day I need something in the next hour if possible Thanks for immediate attentionGina Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Moore Jan Cc Taylor Gina Subject TW Throughput Jan I had a number from you for one of the presentations we put together but I wasnt sure if it was the final actuals for What was TWs total actual throughput for

FW budgetHeres the information Elizabeth is looking for Im no budget expert so I would REALLY appreciate some big time help in responding to Elizabeth Thanks Gina Original Message From Linnell Elizabeth Sent Tuesday September PM To Taylor Gina Subject FW budget Gina Basically what Im looking for is the ETS Communication PR information which I think is just your group Sorry I wasnt more clear Thanks Elizabeth Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Tuesday September PM To Linnell Elizabeth Cc Taylor Gina Subject FW budget I am not sure what you mean by GPG really ETS corporate groups Maybe you can give me a call and we can discuss Thanks Original Message From Taylor Gina Sent Tuesday September AM To Geaccone Tracy Subject FW budget Can you help Elizabeth with this Thanks Gina Original Message From Linnell Elizabeth Sent Tuesday September AM To Taylor Gina Subject budget Gina and Jo Im pulling together some information regarding the companys total spend on PR and Govt Affairs Im in contact with the individual pipeline groups regarding their state level GA spend Can you provide me any budget and headcount estimates for the GPG corporate groups I understand that the business units prepare their budgets later than Corp but even rough numbers would be helpful Thanks for your help

One Last Review QA for Billion Line of CreditWould you take one last look at this document After you I receive your final approval Ill forward to Stan Once this document is approved we will use this document as reference ONLY Thanks Gina

Thanksgiving Message to EGS US EmployeesStan Below is a Thanksgiving note from you to all EGS US employees Please let me know what feedback you have John Ambler reviewed and approved this message Id like to get this out to employees on Tuesday Nov Also Im on tap with Lou to get an ETS Salutes memo out early next week acknowledging the employeesdepartments who worked this week on the financing Look forward to hearing from youGina With the Thanksgiving Holiday upon us I want to take this opportunity to wish you and yours a safe and happy Holiday With the recent events in our nation giving thanks this year has taken on a whole new meaning This Thanksgiving we honor the brave enduring heroes who gave their lives and who are abroad fighting for freedom We can be thankful for our great nation and for the world coming together I know here at Enron we are working through some challenging times and everyone in the organization is working hard Please take some time over the Holiday to enjoy your family and friends Happy Thanksgiving Stan

FW Enron Announces Plans to Merge with DynegyI just received this email Its not new information It came into the OT C mailbox anonymously on November fyi Gina Kay Woods PM ToKen Lay Office of the nronxgate ccTeam AndrewsET nron Team BigLakeEldoradoET nro n Team BigLakeET nron Team AndrewsBrownfieldET nron Team AndrewsPlainviewStaET nron Team AndrewsPlainsETSEnr nron TEAM MidlandET NRON Team BlackRemote ott George ott Dorcy ott R ichard ott DeWayne ott Rober t ForeeET NRON Team JalCompressorsET nron Team JalTa nkfarmET nron Team KermitTurbineET nron Ken GrayETS nron Bob BandelET NRON James R LawrenceET NRO N Randall MobleyET nron Scott NRON Robert New NRON Sandy CasonET nron Helen SandeferETSEnro nron Amy BakerET NRON Timothy JonesETSEnron Judy Collins ET NRON Adel NRON Kerry GramseET nron SubjectRe Enron Announces Plans to Merge with Dynegy I have done a lot of thinking these past few days and have decided to share my thoughts with you and the board of directors I mean after all FACTS are friendlyRight I have had the utmost respect for Enron and the board for all of my year s thru mergers and name changes and cuts and all the ups and downs Let m e just stop beating around the bush and just get down to the bottom line h ere I like everyone else out here have some questions and comments for you I want you to get down to our terms and answer these in laymans terms we u nderstand pistons crankshafts and nuts bolts so please keep all of you acronyms out of it Where in the world did you get the questions for the MergerQA Someone has messed around with our retirement our livelyhood and our famil ies Do you really think we give a flip about what Enron field is named Do you really think we care if the Enron body shop stays open Do you really think we care about the United Way right now NO We have been cheated out of money here Have you ever put a pencil to i t Probably not since your wages total in the MM figure Lets just do that lets figure out what a measley shares calculates to before and what it will be upon the merge X D early X D mid X D X lets say D next year Ouch And that is a comparison to our stock NOT our stock OPTIONS I and everyone else out here want to be compensated for what has happened you had guys bailing out with MM They will be sitting high on the hog and we have people looking at a measley plus the thought of losing their jobs with the merger How ironic that the Code of Ethics is sent out immediately after your merge r email Does the board of directors EVER read that document We read it MANY times a year Perhaps you should practice what you all preach Have you had a stranger walk up to you on the street and ask What have YOU done to the stock Well that is happening out here What have we done to deserve this treatme nt Nothing but cut ourselves down to the meanest leanest teams around on ly to have something like this slapped in our faces I am ashamed embarrassed and MAD What happened Who did it We want compensation What should I say now Hmmm GO DYNEGY

FW You are Invited to an Open Season Reception for Desert Crossing Gas Storage and Transportation SystemFYI This is an interesting way to get information communicated about a proposed project Gina Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday January AM To Taylor Gina Subject You are Invited to an Open Season Reception for Desert Crossing Gas Storage and Transportation System Open Season has officially started today for the new Desert Crossing Gas Storage and Transportation System Allegheny Energy Supply Salt River Project and Sempra Energy Resources invite you to visit with them at one of their Open Season Receptions You will be receiving in the mail over the next day or so an invitation to attend a Shippers Meeting for the new storage and pipeline facility These meetings are designed to communicate the benefits of contracting for Desert Crossing capacity to potentially interested customers for this the largest proposed gas storage facility in the US Southwest We would like you to join us along with the projects three sponsorsAllegheny Energy Supply Salt River Project SRP and Sempra Energy Resources to discuss any issues or questions which you might have The meetings will be taking place at key locations across the Southwest during four consecutive afternoons next week starting on Tuesday January th in San Diego Wednesday and Thursdays meetings will be in Houston and Fridays meeting in Phoenix All meetings begin at pm local time with a cocktail reception commencing at pm Representatives will be available to discuss reserving capacity on the Desert Crossing Gas Storage and Transportation System The following are the dates and times of each of the Open Season Receptions Tuesday January in San Diego Hyatt Regency Islandia Quivira Road San Diego California PM Reception PM Cocktails Wednesday January in Houston Galleria Hotel Derek West Loop South at Westheimer Houston Texas PM Reception PM Cocktails Thursday January in Houston Downtown The Four Seasons Hotel Lamar Street Houston Texas PM Reception PM Cocktails Friday January in Phoenix Phoenix Pointe South Mountain Resort South Pointe Parkway E Phoenix Arizona PM Reception PM Cocktails Please RSVP to Skipping Stone at or tollfree The hotels have a limited number of rooms reserved at a discount For more information visit wwwdesertcrossingcom We look forward to seeing you at the Desert Crossing Shippers Meeting next week

FW Clipfyi Gina Original Message From BWHO mailto Sent Thursday January PM To Taylor Gina Subject Clip PRESS RELEASEUtilicorp Unit To Develop Ariz Facility UCU Jan at BWMOAQUILAUCU Aquila Set to Develop Arizona Gas Storage Facility Business Editors KANSAS CITY MoBUSINESS WIREJan Aquila the wholly owned subsidiary of UtiliCorp United NYSE UCU announced today that it has purchased the Red Lake Storage Project from Southwest Gas Corporation The purchase includes acres approximately miles north of Kingman Arizona and the rights to develop a salt cavern storage facility Along with the land Aquila purchased the water and mineral rights necessary to develop the facility The facility will have a gas storage capacity of billion cubic feet Bcf The first phase of the facility with a storage capacity of Bcf is expected to be in operation by the fourth quarter of with the full Bcf planned for the fourth quarter of The facility will connect to pipelines operated by El Paso Natural Gas Pipeline and Transwestern Pipeline Company Aquila anticipates beginning an open season for the facility within the next seven to ten days In an open season period a company seeks storages commitments from potential clients This facility fits with our strategy to build or acquire assets that enable us to provide clients with the energy they need when they encounter dramatic increases in demand said Ed Mills president and chief operating officer of Aquila The facility is positioned to serve Arizona power plants as well as other facilities in Nevada and California There are approximately gasfired power plants in Arizona representing one of the largest single concentrations of such facilities in the United States Southwest Gas Corporation is pleased to see the Red Lakes Storage Project being developed said Ed Zub executive vice president of Southwest Gas Corporation Development of this project will benefit the states of Arizona and Nevada where Southwest Gas Corporation serves more than million customers Aquila currently owns one of the largest independent storage facilities in the southwest a Bcf facility in Katy Texas The company is also currently completing the acquisition of a storage facility near Lodi California which will provide gas to the frequently energyshort cities in northern California With the addition of the Red Lake Storage Project Aquila will be one of the largest independent storage providers for power plants and local gas distribution companies in the Southwest Based in Kansas City Aquila is a leading wholesaler of natural gas power and coal in North America and provider of risk management services Aquila also provides wholesale energy and risk management services in the United Kingdom Germany and Scandinavia Aquila is wholly owned by Kansas Citybased UtiliCorp United an international energy company with million customers across the US and in Canada the United Kingdom New Zealand and Australia Additional information is available at wwwaquilacom or contact Mark D Cook at LVDdx CONTACT Aquila Media Contact Al Butkus Media Relations Investor Contact Ellen Fairchild KEYWORD MISSOURI ARIZONA CALIFORNIA NEVADA UNITED KINGDOM GERMANY NEW ZEALAND AUSTRALIA INTERNATIONAL EUROPE ASIA PACIFIC CANADA INDUSTRY KEYWORD ENERGY OILGAS UTILITIES SOURCE Aquila Todays News On The Net Business Wires full file on the Internet with Hyperlinks to your home page URL END DOW JONES NEWS PM Company Symbols UCU Subject Codes IELC IUEC NDJN NDJWI NCNW NDJWB NLNG NPRL NTPCT NWEI MNND MTPX MUTI PNRG RMO RNAPW RNERC RNME RSPP RUS RUSC PREXCL

ArticleI wanted to be sure you saw this Gina Development of Sonoran Pipeline Project Halted PR Newswire Copyright c PR Newswire HOUSTON Feb PRNewswireFirstCall Kinder Morgan Energy Partners LP NYSE KMP and Calpine Corporation NYSE CPN today announced the termination of the proposed Sonoran Pipeline project The Sonoran Pipeline was unable to secure sufficient binding commitments to make a successful project given market conditions Securing firm transportation agreements was a stipulation that executives of both companies initially stated was necessary before development of the project could begin Neither company has spent significant dollars on the proposed development of the pipeline and it was not expected to begin service until Both KMP and Calpine will continue to evaluate other opportunities to serve the growing California market Phase I of the proposed Sonoran Pipeline would have extended from the Blanco Hub and terminated near Needles and Topock Calif with the possibility of a second phase extending into northern California Based in San Jose Calif Calpine Corporation is an independent power company that is dedicated to providing customers with clean efficient natural gasfired power generation It generates and markets power through plants it develops owns and operates in states in the United States three provinces in Canada and in the United Kingdom Calpine also is the worlds largest producer of renewable geothermal energy and it owns trillion cubic feet equivalent of proved natural gas reserves in Canada and the United States The company was founded in and is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol CPN For more information about Calpine visit its website at wwwcalpinecom Kinder Morgan Energy Partners L P is the nations largest pipeline master limited partnership with an enterprise value of approximately billion KMP owns and operates more than miles of pipelines and over terminals Its pipelines transport more than two million barrels per day of gasoline and other petroleum products and up to billion cubic feet per day of natural gas Its terminals handle over million tons of coal and other bulk materials annually and have a liquids storage capacity of more than million barrels for petroleum products and chemicals KMP is also the leading provider in the US of CO which is used in enhanced oil recovery projects

RE Draft TW Sun Devil Successful Open Season Press Release Cc Instead of being specific about the route I will communicate that we are studying alternative routes and its premature to communicate which route the pipeline might take We will consider community and environmental input to determine the pipeline route Gina Original Message From Shafer John Sent Wednesday September PM To Gadd Eric Hayslett Rod Taylor Gina Cc Haden Sarah Cebryk Doug Kilmer III Robert Hyatt Kevin Pryor Tony Lokey Teb McCarty Danny Martin Jerry D Mayeux Gay Corman Shelley Veatch Stephen Lowry Phil Subject RE Draft TW Sun Devil Successful Open Season Press Release As an FYI To release any information to the public at this early stage related to a proposed corridor prior to making personal contact with key environmental groups key agencies and political types would be premature and offer opportunities for groups or individual landowners to polarize and organize opposition against Sun Devil We have found that in most cases the environmental community is very negative towards a new project if they are called for a quote from the media prior to having a headsup on the project from the project sponsor We are setting a strategy to accomplish this and roll out the project in the best way John Original Message From Gadd Eric Sent Wednesday September PM To Hayslett Rod Taylor Gina Cc Haden Sarah Shafer John Cebryk Doug Kilmer III Robert Hyatt Kevin Pryor Tony Lokey Teb McCarty Danny Martin Jerry D Mayeux Gay Corman Shelley Veatch Stephen Subject RE Draft TW Sun Devil Successful Open Season Press Release The preliminary concept for the Phoenix lateral was to follow the I interstate highway We have not advertised that existing ROW is under consideration because the existing ROW belongs to El Paso Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday September PM To Taylor Gina Cc Haden Sarah Shafer John Gadd Eric Cebryk Doug Kilmer III Robert Hyatt Kevin Pryor Tony Lokey Teb McCarty Danny Martin Jerry D Mayeux Gay Corman Shelley Veatch Stephen Subject RE Draft TW Sun Devil Successful Open Season Press Release See minor attached comments What are the sources for the data such as the reserve margin information in the QA Original Message From Taylor Gina Sent Wednesday September PM To Shafer John Gadd Eric Cebryk Doug Kilmer III Robert Hyatt Kevin Pryor Tony Lokey Teb McCarty Danny Martin Jerry D Mayeux Gay Corman Shelley Veatch Stephen Hayslett Rod Cc Haden Sarah Subject Draft TW Sun Devil Successful Open Season Press Release Importance High Attached is draft of the Sun Devil press release The qa has been updated Please review and let me know what changes you have to this release I need to hear back from you by am Thursday Sept with changes After I have your changes I will forward to Stan and Corp PR Were down to the wire on getting this out on Thursday Sept Thanks Gina

Press Release for your Review TWs Sun Devil Expansion Cc Please review the attached press release announcing Sun Devils successful open season TW management has reviewed the release and their changes have been included Project cost information was deliberately omitted from the release If asked I will indicate that TW is finalizing the scope of the project and preparing cost estimates for the facilities and that TW engineers are preparing estimates required for the FERC application Concerning questions about the pipeline route I will respond that through our community outreach initiative TW will review route and corridor alternatives with interested community members TW will consider community and environmental input to determine the pipeline route Can I hear back from you by Friday Sept at NOON with changes We plan to issue the release on Monday Sept at noon Thanks for your immediate attention Gina

July VV Meeting SummaryAnother great meeting this month Thanks for your participation Please mark your calendar for our next Vision and Values meeting Wednesday August from am until noon in eb c Below summarizes the key points from our July meeting Communications Training Feedback from II continues to be positive The number of vps and above not enrolled in Executive Impact and Influence increased to The increase is the result of cancellations We had a discussion about what the quantifiable penalty would be for vps and above who DID NOT participate in the Executive Impact and Influence training I continue to research this issue I hope to have an update at our next meeting on August Work continues on the development on Executive Impact and Influence II The design of this oneday training session is slated to be completed by the end of August The plan is to conduct the first training session by the end of September PD training will be included in the course curriculum Development of the online communications course continues working with Cognitive Arts with a target completion of year end VV Task Force members will receive a call from Cognitive Arts to provide input into the design of the course Communication Tools The updated PeopleFinder and ExpertFinder are on schedule PeopleFinder should be available at the end of July and ExpertFinder should be available by midSeptember PD Work continues to roll PD out in the new Enron tool ThinkBank Initial map sites for drop down content on the PD flowchart are being developed Facilitators are currently being identified throughout the organization We need all VV Task Force members to communicate with their business units about using this tool when appropriate Communication Campaign Additional products continue to be distributed throughout the Houston Enron building with interesting Enron facts Targeted international offices received their Vision and Values posters Diversity Dick Liebert reported that questions for the ETC survey are currently being developed Three additional Diversity Focus Groups are being held to include the perspective of commercial employees A meeting of the entire Diversity Task Force is scheduled for Sept Best Companies Survey Mary Clark and team completed Enrons application and forwarded it to Fortune on July Keep your fingers crossed That covers the high points of the meeting Please let me know if you have additional information to share with the group Beth and I will see you August Gina

Re Revised ETS Storylike the idea of a first quarter review of We just may not be able to pull off to the extent we did last year Did Stan indicate exactly what he had in mind Does he want to video stream again If so we should start planning now to ensure we get a large enough space booked early as well as booking the video company and working with the EBS folks I have the presentation we used for s review in my right cabinet above my desk If its ok with you Ill ask you to communicate with Kimberly on the details Were getting ready to leave for the hospital I cant believe today is the day Keith and I both are quite nervous and confident at the same time Please keep us in your prayers and as soon as we name the baby well call the office Kimberly is on point to send out an email Have a great Thursday Gina Shelley Corman PM To Gina nron cc Subject Re Revised ETS Story Good luck on your big day tomorrow I have been thinking about you all week FYI Stan is interested in having a year in review session in the first quarter of Im going to have Kimberly start working on this Stan said that he felt like this was a very successful event last year would like to use it as an opportunity to get Dan out in front of all of the employees

Graphics Services and Design Cc Your group has been using Debbie Moore for graphics services and design work We want to be sure that you are aware that we are eliminating our graphics services and design work capabilities effective March As a result of the December layoffs the services of Bowne Graphics are not available onsite either Some units have expressed alarm at the loss of Debbie However absent strong expression of need and willingness to pay for services Debbie will leave Enron on Monday March and we will no longer have the capability to provide graphic services and design Consequently you may want to identify other sources for this support Please let us know if you have strong concerns about this action John Ambler and Gina Taylor
Slides per your requestLet me know if you need additional information Gina

ThanksHi Shelley How are things going Did you have a good weekend with Alina I sure hope so Thanks so much for whatever input you had into my bonus I really appreciate your support and confidence in me I would love to get together for lunch when you have time Take care Gina
